DrugInfoMetaData.DrugInfoDescription: This chemotherapy combination contains the drugs vinblastine sulfate (Velban), ifosfamide, and cisplatin (Platinol). Combinations usually work better than single drugs because different drugs kill cancer cells in different ways.

Section.Para: Each of the drugs in this combination is approved by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) to treat cancer or conditions related to cancer.
